sentence.Network_en: He has never exhibited the self-confidence, bordering on arrogance, of his predecessor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从未表现出他前任的那种近乎傲慢的自信。

sentence.Network_en: Unconscious envy manifests itself very often as this kind of arrogance.
sentence.Network_cn: 潜意识里的嫉妒常表现为这种傲慢自大。

sentence.Network_en: At times the arrogance of those in power is quite blatant.
sentence.Network_cn: 有时那些当权者颇为傲慢嚣张。

《Friends》词汇表B ... americans n. 美国人, 美洲人 arrogance n. 傲慢态度, 自大 deathbed n. 临死所卧之床, 临终之时.

list.abs: ...，这是在学习期间，过了入门的阶段，就不需要了。安全考虑：security consideration傲慢行为：arrogant behavior多极化：multipolarity
arrogantly 自大地arrogate to 硬性归于arrogate 冒称
arrogant person looks down on others ., 傲慢的人看不起其他人.
【摘要】 不可一世(insufferably arrogant)(Viva Live) 魔鬼的主意(Devil's desire)(Viva Live) 活着VIVA(Living Viva)(Viva Live).

entry.def: Someone who is arrogant behaves in a proud, unpleasant way towards other people because they believe that they are more important than others.

example.tran: 那话听起来很嚣张，是不是？

means.word_mean: 1. overbearing pride evidenced by a superior manner toward inferiors

auth_sentence.content: Don't listen to the scientists and their arrogance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't listen to the scientists and their arrogance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't listen to the scientists and their arrogance.

auth_sentence.content: The...intellectual arrogance which led to his downfall in Greats.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The...intellectual arrogance which led to his downfall in Greats.

auth_sentence.content: Look at his haughty air of pride and arrogance!
auth_sentence.res_content: Look at his haughty air of pride and arrogance!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Look at his haughty air of pride and arrogance!

stems_affixes.word_buile: ar一再+rog要求,问+ant……的→一再要求的→傲慢的
derogate[v.贬低,诽谤]+ory……的→adj.不敬的,诽谤的
ar一再+rog要求,问+ance表名词→一再要的→arrogance傲慢
pre预先+rog要求+ative……的→预先要求→[有]特权
ab去掉+rog要求,问+ate表动词→不再要求有→取消掉
ar一再+rog要求+ate表动词→一再要求→硬是说
de向下,坏+rog要求,问+ate表动词→坏坏的问下去→贬低
inter在……中间+rog要求,问+ate表动词→在[审问室]中问→审问
pro前+rog要求,问+ue→提前问好[下次开会日期]→休会
sur下面+rog要求+ate使……→v.使代理, 使代替

sentences.en: I disliked him for his arrogance.
His arrogance comes out in every speech he makes.
sentences.cn: 他每次讲话都表现得骄傲自大。
